content: before the instep ssk k1 knit the instep stitches k1 k2tog knit until back of round 2 knit repeat gusset decrease rounds 1&2 until you are back at your cast on stitch number 56/60/64/72 proceed to foot afterthought heel 1 determine where you want the heel placed place marker on back of foot where the stitch is to be cut 2 pick up the r leg of each stitch on the row above and the row below the marked stitch 3 snip the center stitch 4 unpick 28/30/32/36 stitches rejoin yarn optional depth increase knit 3 rounds in plain stockinette 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k1 2 knit repeat rounds 1&2 until you reach 6/8/8/12 stitches per needle kitchener heel stitches together foot this is where you customize your foot knit stockinette in the round until 2 before the end of your foot for my us women s 8-8 5 shoe i knit 70 rounds in 75/25 65 in 80/20 my husband wears approx a men s 10 i knit 95 rounds for his both of these include gusset stitch rounds proceed to toe 6 ambtastic s favorite vanilla socks © 2021 by amberhastings toe 3 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k1 4 knit repeat rounds 1&2 until you reach 6/8/8/12 stitches per needle use kitchener stitch to graft toe together 7 ambtastic s favorite vanilla socks © 2021 by amberhastings
